info.title: BackBon API DOCUMENTATION
info.description: This is the Project Progres Information System API documentation.

get.summary: Get all source types by source type name
Get list of bills with related information
get.description: Retrieve all bills including bill items, bill file, payments, referral details, patients, reasons, and hospitals.

200.description: Bills retrieved successfully OR no data found

post.description: Create a new bill for a referral linked to a bill file

get.summary: Find bill by ID with related information
get.description: Retrieve a single bill including bill items, bill file, payments, referral details, patients, reasons, and hospitals.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: ID of the bill to retrieve

put.description: Update a bill's referral, amount, period, status, or bill file

get.summary: Find bill by ID with related information
get.description: Retrieve list of bills including bill items, bill file, payments, referral details, patients, reasons, and hospitals.

parameters.name: billFileId
parameters.description: ID of the bill to retrieve

get.summary: Get patient, bill and payments by bill ID
Get all monthly bills by hospital ID
get.description: Returns hospital details and all monthly bills for the specified hospital.

403.description: Forbidden - user does not have permission

followup_date.description: Follow-up date (required for Follow-up, Finished, Transferred, Death)

get.summary: Get a patient list by ID
Get all patients by patient list ID

file.description: Optional patient file (PDF, Image, Doc, etc.)

get.summary: Get a patient history by ID

post.summary: Create a payment and allocate to bills from a bill file

bill_file_id.description: ID of the bill file from which bills will be fetched

payment_date.description: Optional payment date; defaults to now if not provided

get.summary: Get a single payment by ID

put.summary: Update a payment and optionally re-allocate across bills
put.description: Update an existing payment details like payer, amount, currency, method, reference number, voucher number, payment date, and optionally re-allocate payment across bills linked to a bill file.

bill_file_id.description: Optional: Bill file ID to re-allocate payment across bills referencing this file

get.summary: Get all referral comment by referral id

get.description: Fetch aggregated hospital billing data (total bills, paid, pending, amounts) within a given date range.

parameters.name: hospital_id
parameters.description: Optional hospital ID to filter results

post.summary: Bulk import diagnoses from Excel file

file.description: Excel file with diagnosis_name and diagnosis_code columns
